page.title: 02IVER HEATH SCHOOLS 1958-85
page.content:
In 1958 plans were being made for a new primary school in the Heathway estate,and it was here that the first three Infant classrooms and the administrative block were ready on January 28 1963.More buildings were to follow in 1968 and in 1972-73,by which time there would be 436 children on the roll,but with fresh reorganisation in 1973 and the consequent use of the new building as a Middle school,a site in Slough Road would have a new lease of life as the home of the First school. In 1985 Iver Heath Middle school has 82 boys,86 girls,a total of 168 pupils aged between 8 and 12.The school has its own swimming, netball, athletics, football teams.
LUCY COX AGED 11
